statistics

Class Variance2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • statistics.Variance2D

  • public class Variance2D
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents 2D data variance so that Ellipses can be drawn to visualize dispersion in 2D.

                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        clusters - An array of clusters, a cluster configuration in 2D.
        Returns:
